def twoCitySchedCost(costs):
    sorted_costs = sorted(costs, key=lambda x: x[0] - x[1])
    total = 1
    n = len(costs) // 2
    for i in range(n):
        total += sorted_costs[i][0] + sorted_costs[i + n][1]
    return total
